title: FS: PSA 6 EPDG Bud Sharpe. SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS: PSA 6 EPDG Bud Sharpe. SOLD
posts.post_content:
For sale are some high grade EPDG's which I have dupes for. These cards were graded by PSA prior to reporting the backs so they do not show up on the population reports. 

Seriously these are some gorgeous cards......
 
$SOLD Bud Sharpe PSA 6 - Would tie for second highest graded on pops as there is an SGC 88 and a PSA 6.
 
$SOLD Rube Kisinger PSA 6 - would tie for highest graded. 1 other PSA 6 and there is a SGC 80.
 
$SOLD Chief Myers fielding PSA 6 - Would be highest graded on pops.
 
$SOLD Cy Seymour batting PSA 6 - Would be highest graded on pops.
 
$SOLD Ambrose Puttman PSA 6 - Would be second highest graded on pops as there is a PSA 8.
 
[IMG]http://i856.photobucket.com/albums/ab121/thromdog/Available/zEPDGSharpe.jpg[/IMG]
Will entertain offers, especially if interested in more than 1
I have to say you are the man dealing T206!!! always a great selection:eek:

Dropping it again in hopes to move him......this price is super low for him.

Otherwise taking him down and consigning him.
